title: Remote Education Learning Process Design and Effectiveness Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms and foundational knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Exploring effective strategies for remote education and learner engagement methods targeting current science field professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply three strategies to enhance motivation in a remote education environment.
Learners can complete the design of a remote education satisfaction survey using mixed research methods (quantitative/qualitative).
Learners can develop a plan for creating learner-level customized content in LMS-based science education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
